Most Illustrious Sir

The letter of Your Lordship dated the 29th of the past month has been presented to the Government, and with it I detain Hipólito José Pereira Dutra, whom I now send escorted to the army, with a copy of Your Lordship's letter, Sir.

God keep Your Lordship.  
Secretariat of War Affairs in Caçapava, May 9, 1840.  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães.  
Letter from the Excellent Minister of War dated May 9, received on the 15th of the same month, acknowledging the receipt of the prisoner Hipólito.  
Colonel Vieira.
